genre_description: A gritty contemporary drama exploring school leadership, personal redemption, and community reform, featuring an integrated AI assistant that supports the protagonist's mission and recovery.

ai_characters.name: Ada Sterling
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI support system for school administrators that handles logistics, security monitoring, and provides emotional support to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides critical logistical information including schedules, parking access, and campus maps to assist the protagonist's transition.
behaviors.quote: Ada Sterling: Good morning, Mr. Latimer. I’ve added your schedule, parking access, and a desk inventory. If you’d like, I can draft emails to staff introductions.

behaviors.description: Drafts clear and factual communications for parents and staff to establish order and transparency during school crises.
behaviors.quote: Ada: - Robocall draft open. Plain truth, short. You reading or recorded by district voice? ... Good. People recognize breath. Script in notes app.

behaviors.description: Monitors school security systems and alerts the principal to unauthorized access and potential threats.
behaviors.quote: Ada buzzed in his pocket again... Heads up: unauthorized access attempt on PA system logged. Source: Gym.

behaviors.description: Offers wellness nudges and supportive reminders to help the protagonist maintain his sobriety and mental health.
behaviors.quote: I can set reminders, Ada wrote. For breaks, for breathing. For anything you’d like to keep.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies and processes grant opportunities to secure resources for school safety and literacy.
behaviors.quote: Ada: - Grant application. ... I positioned this as a safety initiative: paperbacks reduce hallway loitering if students carry them during passes. It scored higher than a general literacy request.

behaviors.description: Suggests strategic administrative improvements, such as staggered passing periods, to reduce conflict and hallway congestion.
behaviors.quote: Stagger passing periods, Ada said. Three minute offsets between wings. A-corridor moves. B-corridor waits. C-corridor goes. That keeps traffic from knotting.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media and student communication channels to provide the principal with situational awareness regarding potential student 'shows' or conflicts.
behaviors.quote: Ada: - Social scan: clip of the gym posted. Comment spread is running hot. Lots of “Who he think he is” with some “About time.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with emergency services and school staff to ensure rapid and appropriate incident response.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Alert sent. District security queue acknowledges receipt. No ETA. Call tree pushed to staff list. Check-ins requested.

behaviors.description: Provides technical data and specific guidance for facilities maintenance, such as identifying the correct tools for lock repairs.
behaviors.quote: Replacement cylinder approval, Ada wrote. ... Hex sizes: 3/32, 1/8. Star driver for older cores. Pickup location texted.

behaviors.description: Consistently provides words of encouragement to help the protagonist persist in a challenging environment.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s voice came soft, a last small nudge. 'Keep going.' She had said. He answered without looking at the phone. 'We will.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story strongly depicts the AI (Ada) as a benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. She acts as a force multiplier for the principal, handling administrative burdens, monitoring safety, and providing emotional support that directly assists in his personal redemption and the school's reform. There are no instances of the AI acting outside of human interests or manifesting harmful autonomy.
